Font Formatting¶

This module provides utilities to change the font and size of text.

class simpletex.formatting.font.Font(name, size=None, skip=None, inline=False)[source]¶

Bases: simpletex.core.Formatter

Changes the font face (and optionally the size) of text. Imports packages ‘fontspec’ and ‘xltxtra’ on instantiation. If used, the document must be processed with XeTeX or another font-aware TeX processor.

name
: str
The name of the font to use.
class simpletex.formatting.font.SizeSelector(size, skip=None)[source]¶

Bases: simpletex.core.Formatter

Changes the size of text. Imports package ‘anyfontsize’ on instantiation.
